author: vgritsenko
msg: COCOON-2173: Make pipeline locking behavior optional.
Limit maximum wait time by configurable non infinite value.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Merged changes from trunk revision r641102. Fix for TUSCANY-2120. Create service references dynamically to invoke the node manager and start/stop nodes using the correct node URI. Also some minor cleanup, renamed DomainNodeLauncher to DomainManagerLauncher and remaining instances of DomainAdmin to DomainManager to make naming consistent.

author: oching
msg: -group defective artifacts by repository in the report

author: jsdelfino
